data.description: Fluke is looking for an Electric Measurement Product Management Intern to join our team in Everett, WA for summer 2026! This intern will support strategic initiatives within Fluke’s Electrical Test Tools business. The role focuses on driving adoption among early-career technicians and building a data-driven view of product lifetime value to inform pricing, bundling, and digital attach strategies. Responsibilities: Early-Career Segment Campaigns Execute and track pilot programs (e.g., trade-ins, campus kits) targeting apprentices and new field techs using DMMs, clamp meters, and electrical testers—focused on competitive conversion. Product Lifetime Value Modeling Aggregate usage and upgrade data to support development of an LTV model for Fluke tools, identifying attach opportunities for accessories and digital platforms like Fluke Connect. Go-to-Market Support Collaborate with product and digital teams to shape pricing, bundling, and starter offers that drive early adoption an...
